channel.title: defi on Dwarves Foundation
channel.description: Recent content in defi on Dwarves Foundation

item.title: Building better Binance transfer tracking
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Binance is one of the most popular Decentralized Exchanges worldwide, so the demand for building Binance-integrated applications is growing daily. My team is also onboarding.

item.title: Introduce to Solana Token 2022 - new standard to create a token in solana
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Introduction Solana Token 2022 Program (Token extensions) is the next generation of the Solana Program Library standard. Token extensions introduce a new set of ways to extend the normal token functionality.
